title: Daverog5
author: Daverog5
content: I have been following there Facebook page (etn electroneum) and deceided to get in at the price. New blockchain coming which will make it etn20 and the ability to create new tokens far cheaper than erc20...also they have the anytask platform with a big supporting team....read the social media could change the world if this thing gets out there? Worth a punt! Not saying you should as this crypto lark is extremely risky but out of everything I have looked at it serves an actual real world purpose and helping the poor is always a good thing...

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Daverog5 on July 10, 2023, 06:11:58 PMI have been following there Facebook page (etn electroneum) and deceided to get in at the price. New blockchain coming which will make it etn20 and the ability to create new tokens far cheaper than erc20...also they have the anytask platform with a big supporting team....read the social media could change the world if this thing gets out there? Worth a punt! Not saying you should as this crypto lark is extremely risky but out of everything I have looked at it serves an actual real world purpose and helping the poor is always a good thing...It's gonna be hard for them to compete with the existing ones that has their own smart contracts like Ethereum and BNB. But if you're optimistic on them and you're seeing that there's a chance and possibility. I wish you good luck on that, I've seen how this token became popular before because of their mobile mining.Then, it has come to an end and lie low and now they're trying to revive it with that ETN20. I don't know that they've come up to that but then, it's your thought that counts on that project and your money.

comments.author: ahoenk
comments.body: Etn is the coin from 2016 right ? If i am not mistaken it is mined by phone ( their marketing campaign ). I though this coin death already and if i am not wrong we can not put smart contract on it. So the new update is only smart contract thing ? We have many coin can do that. Polygon, avalanche and many coin to come.

comments.author: Daverog5
comments.body: Hi thanks for the input...no as I read it this will be a revolutionary revision and I think talk of a wrapped etn so it can be easily listed on binance etc....also the CEO is on the digital pound foundation board in the UK with ripple (xrp) and Quant....this tells me no rugpull here...fingers crossed!!!

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: Electroneum team has lost it, even if they come back people won't believe them, the way they treated their investors in the past is so bad, unless they have a change of team and these are trusted people in the space also with good funding from big VCs to help them scale and a true revamp of their tokenomics, they need to do this to be able to make allocation for the VCs and build strong community. With how competitive the L1 space is now, I don't think the electroneum team have any chance because there are large percentage of L1 blockchains current that are ghost town, I will stay clear of this now

comments.author: Daverog5
comments.body: I beg to differ....this coin serves a purpose now and anytask proves this...Please tell me what project isn't a scam? This coin actually helps the poor...

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: Daverog5 on July 10, 2023, 06:11:58 PMI have been following there Facebook page (etn electroneum) and deceided to get in at the price. New blockchain coming which will make it etn20 and the ability to create new tokens far cheaper than erc20...also they have the anytask platform with a big supporting team....read the social media could change the world if this thing gets out there? Worth a punt! Not saying you should as this crypto lark is extremely risky but out of everything I have looked at it serves an actual real world purpose and helping the poor is always a good thing...You choose to follow a project that was created in the year 2017 which is also exactly the last time it make an ATH price and apart from that the concept it was built is something almost all scalable cryptocurrency projects can offer. I will advise you to sell it and hold Bitcoin but if you're a potential cheap coin you can check Combo since it's listed on Binance.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: Daverog5 on July 10, 2023, 08:15:51 PMHi thanks for the input...no as I read it this will be a revolutionary revision and I think talk of a wrapped etn so it can be easily listed on binance etc....also the CEO is on the digital pound foundation board in the UK with ripple (xrp) and Quant....this tells me no rugpull here...fingers crossed!!! I don't know about those details but you are on your own and it seem that you've got a lot of information about them.So, there's not that much to tell you as if you're aware of what you're doing. That's why I'll just tell you good luck if you're really on it and you've got an optimistic mindset on ETN.Quote from: Daverog5 on July 10, 2023, 09:33:07 PMI beg to differ....this coin serves a purpose now and anytask proves this...Please tell me what project isn't a scam? This coin actually helps the poor...This is a different discussion, most projects will say that they're there to help everyone and make profits.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: If you looked at it, real-world purpose can be one of the main conditions to make a project successful if they can actually make an innovation to offer some great positive results with their project. However, this does not only stop when they released their roadmaps concerning their plans because consistent updates and development are needed as well so that the project will be fully recognized by the mass. Therefore, if you know what you are doing concerning investment in this project, just don't forget to give yourself time to review it and not gonna hype yourself to invest more than you can afford to lose.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.created_time: July 11, 2023, 11:17:32 AMLast edit: July 16, 2023, 03:35:12 AM by DapanasFruit
comments.body: I am actually surprised that Electroneum (ETN) is still alive. Well good for them. I guess there is always a resurrection and I am hoping that the people behind it will make sure they know what they are doing and that they can achieve their goals especially to people they promised to. Anyway, there are now far better projects available on the market with more exciting future so if I were you I would be focusing my eyes on them...just my humble suggestion.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: OP is never going to agree with any thoughts that's negative to ETN. He sounds more like a marketing employee trying to disguise himself as an "investor" with the way he responds to the comments. Notice that he registered just recently only to post this.He also keeps mentioning that anytask which is like a platform that's trying to compete with Upwork. Sure ETN is one of the payment option there but would be job providers really choose that over the more convenient credit cards?

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: I hold ETNs since late 2017. Itâ€™s the first ever ICO project that Iâ€™ve participated back then. Until now I still keep my paper wallet and private keys. Never touched it nor using it as a utility. I just simply hold them not because I am bullish in their project until now. Itâ€™s just that the value is way down than what I have initially bought from 2017. Unless they are going to do something that keeps up with the trend, probably they would be making one more noise especially for ETN token holders.

New blockchain coming which will make it etn20 and the ability to create new tokens far cheaper than erc20...also they have the anytask platform with a big supporting team....read the social media could change the world if this thing gets out there? Worth a punt! Not saying you should as this crypto lark is extremely risky but out of everything I have looked at it serves an actual real world purpose and helping the poor is always a good thing...I thought etn was already dead and buried, didn't know there is something worth saving. this project hard a good start, i remember participating in the ico, made good profit as well. i think things started taking a different turn when mobile mining was introduce or after then. The market is full of layer 1 and 2 projects that it will be hard to get such recognition as before, they had the opportunity to be big but they blew it, and now they will have to fight real hard to be relevant again.

comments.author: Daverog5
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on July 11, 2023, 01:40:03 PMOP is never going to agree with any thoughts that's negative to ETN. He sounds more like a marketing employee trying to disguise himself as an "investor" with the way he responds to the comments. Notice that he registered just recently only to post this.He also keeps mentioning that anytask which is like a platform that's trying to compete with Upwork. Sure ETN is one of the payment option there but would be job providers really choose that over the more convenient credit cards?Hi anytask as I see it takes crypto and credit card payments according to the site. As for a marketing man i don't think I would post here thinking it would make the coin fly!!! I was told about the site to look at as I am into crypto. I just read on there facebook about the new blockchain and I think this could be a good investmentÂ  so am asking people thoughts to find out more info. Seems to be pretty negative on past performance but this new plan they have sounds like they are really trying hard so I still think it could be good looking forward rather than back.

comments.author: nick_2017
comments.body: In 2017, I participated in the Electroneum Bounty, and they gave a decent amount of tokens as a result of this company. I decided to hold their tokens, and as a result, out of the initial $10,000, I had about $300 left. At the beginning of 2023, I sold all ETN tokens. I believe this is not the best project to invest in due to the lack of team activity and lack of project promotion. This is not a financial recommendation, just my opinion!

comments.author: Daverog5
comments.body: Looking at the early years I think they just had some terrible luck then the bitcoin crash which affected all coins....I am just looking forward at the fact they are starting to make alot of noise and fill something big is going to happen ðŸ˜ƒ

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: If this blockchain is not backed by some large capital, there is no point in this new blockchain, nor in new token standards. In the market, the advantage of projects is far from the cost of transaction fees. If that were crucial, blockchains like ETH or TRON would have been forgotten a long time ago because their fees are quite high. This is not the case because these blockchains hold a large layer of the crypto ecosystem. The new token standard itself is of no interest to anyone without proper embedding in the ecosystem. Even if it supports commissions worth $0.00000000001$.

comments.author: Daverog5
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on July 11, 2023, 06:49:52 PMIf this blockchain is not backed by some large capital, there is no point in this new blockchain, nor in new token standards. In the market, the advantage of projects is far from the cost of transaction fees. If that were crucial, blockchains like ETH or TRON would have been forgotten a long time ago because their fees are quite high. This is not the case because these blockchains hold a large layer of the crypto ecosystem. The new token standard itself is of no interest to anyone without proper embedding in the ecosystem. Even if it supports commissions worth $0.00000000001$.My take on this through research is the ico bagged 40 million dollars in bitcoin and ethereum yes? Bitcoin at the time was worth 4500 dollars it then peaked at 60000 a coin now at 30000 so unless they cashed it all which I highly doubt they have a HUGEÂ  budget.....I tell you something is going to happen here I just feel it....

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Daverog5 on July 10, 2023, 06:11:58 PMI have been following there Facebook page (etn electroneum) and deceided to get in at the price. New blockchain coming which will make it etn20 and the ability to create new tokens far cheaper than erc20...also they have the anytask platform with a big supporting team....read the social media could change the world if this thing gets out there? Worth a punt! Not saying you should as this crypto lark is extremely risky but out of everything I have looked at it serves an actual real world purpose and helping the poor is always a good thing...I still remember that Electroneum was a very hyped project like 5 years ago or so when it launched because back then it was the first crypto project that was mineable with your smartphone if i remember correctly or at least the team behind electroneum claimed that. I just took a look at the the price and volume graphs of Electroneum and it really was a active project back then with 10 M $ daily trading volume.Now it is pretty dead though in my opinion with a daily volume of only 33k$. I mean being mineable on a smartphone is not really that big of a bonus right? It just means that everyone that has a phone can install the electroneum app and gets coins then. This creates a lot of selling pressure.I personally would invest in an other project.

comments.author: tsaroz
comments.body: Quote from: Daverog5 on July 10, 2023, 06:11:58 PMI have been following there Facebook page (etn electroneum) and deceided to get in at the price. New blockchain coming which will make it etn20 and the ability to create new tokens far cheaper than erc20...also they have the anytask platform with a big supporting team....read the social media could change the world if this thing gets out there? Worth a punt! Not saying you should as this crypto lark is extremely risky but out of everything I have looked at it serves an actual real world purpose and helping the poor is always a good thing...I'm bullish about electroneum and it's one of the coins that would probably not fail in long term.I was in into electroneum from the start. Done both the virtual and real mining. It's all a good concept and solid coin with a large community. They failed to keep up the hype after their initial listing. And they were not as attractive to mine during the GPU price hike as other cryptonight coins. Although not much oscillation in the price, I still believe it's a good coin to accumulate for the next bull run.
